response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price tailored for you. Considering its value and your interest, I propose a special offer of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects both the quality of the product and the opportunity it presents for you. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
